data Theme Source

Constructors

Theme

Theme, a theme in jigsaw's context.

Fields

name :: String

Name of the theme.

resources :: [Resource]

Resources of the theme.

nbExpert :: Int

Number of expert for the theme needed in a Jigsaw group.

lowerMargin :: Int

Number of additionnal experts allowed in a Jigsaw group.

upperMargin :: Int

Number of less experts allowed in a Jigsaw group.

nbResources :: Int

Number of resources of this theme in an initial group.
